title: [Ta'Illistim, Erissian Var]
description: The large stone walls surrounding the Library Aies stand directly against the cobblestoned var, covered in strands of clinging dark green ivy.  Above the top of the granite wall, the crenellated facade of the library is barely visible in the moonlight.

The large stone walls surrounding the Library Aies stand directly against the cobblestoned var, covered in strands of clinging dark green ivy.  Above the top of the granite wall, the crenellated facade of the library is barely visible through the treetops.

The large stone walls surrounding the Library Aies stand directly against the cobblestoned var, covered in strands of clinging dark grey ivy and white roses.  Above the top of the silvery blue granite wall, the marble facade of the library is barely visible, though awash in lantern light.

The large stone walls surrounding the Library Aies stand directly against the cobblestoned var, covered in strands of clinging dark green ivy and white roses.  Above the top of the silvery blue granite wall, the marble facade of the library is barely visible.
